title: Dispatches: Police Brutality Spells Trouble for Uganda’s Elections (HRW - Human Rights Watch)
text: ( Source : HRW - Human Rights Watch ) Last Saturday, Ugandan police attempted - yet again - to stop opposition activists and candidates from speaking to potential voters. Television cameras filmed as police arrested a female activist in
